1.0.name: wordpress/fantasktic
1.0.description:
This plugin allows you to quickly submit a request to the Fantasktic service from the backend of your site, speeding up the process.

Fantasktic is a simple, secure way to fix any one thing WordPress for $99.

Submitting your request is free with no credit card required.

What can we really fix for $99?

We fix over 95% of WordPress technical support issues and updates for $99 including most host migrations, errors, and theme issues. We use proprietary technology and an awesome, expert team to review your problem and confirm the price before we charge you a penny.

Migrations

  • Move to a new host
  • Problems after a migration
  • Server, hosting issues

Hacks and Errors

  • 404?s on pages and posts
  • Can't get logged into your admin
  • Visible code on your site

Theme and plugin problems
